original_text: And when they go out into the outer court to the people, they shall put off the garments in which they have been ministering and lay them in the holy chambers. And they shall put on other garments, lest they transmit holiness to the people with their garments.
korean_text: 그들이 바깥뜰 백성에게로 나갈 때에는 수종드는 옷을 벗어 거룩한 방에 두고 다른 옷을 입을지니 이는 그 옷으로 백성을 거룩하게 할까 함이라

sentences.original_text: And when they go out into the outer court
they shall put off the garments
in which they have been ministering
and lay them in the holy chambers
And they shall put on other garments
lest they transmit holiness to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 거룩함을 백성에게 전파하지 않게 하기 위함이라
